summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TaxPilot SaaS landing page. All core functionality, navigation, responsiveness, and animations working perfectly. Landing page successfully loads at root URL with all required sections (Hero, Features, How It Works, Pricing, CTA, Footer). All Get Started buttons correctly navigate to /login page.
passed_tests: Landing page loads at root URL '/'
Hero section displays with headline, subheadline, and CTA buttons
Navigation bar with working anchor links (Features, How It Works, Pricing)
All Get Started Free buttons navigate to /login page
Features section shows 6 feature cards (4 main Bento grid + 2 additional)
How It Works section displays 3 steps correctly
Pricing section shows 3 pricing tiers (Starter, Professional, Enterprise)
CTA section at bottom with functional call to action
Framer Motion animations work on scroll (24 animated elements detected)
Responsive design works on mobile (390x844 viewport)
Navbar becomes sticky with glass effect (backdrop-blur) on scroll
All anchor links scroll smoothly to correct sections
All pricing tier buttons navigate to /login correctly
